name: Historica Fantasia
description:
Historica Fantasia take place in a Fantasy World with pseudo-Industrial Era setting.

In the land known as Siegeland Empire,
As an unnamed Dishonored Prince,
you rescued your wrongfully convicted sister from the crime of assassinating her Father, the late Emperor.



As a Commander of your retinue,
you'll lead your sister across the continent to reclaim her place on the Imperial Throne.

During the Adventure,
Players can recruit dozens of Characters with Unique traits to join their retinues.

And in the process,
learn about the History of the World, as well as the conspiracy behind their Father's Death.

Gameplay





Historica Fantasia is a Turn-Based Strategy RPG,
where careful strategic decisions will be necessities in achieving Victory.

Send a scout party on high ground to find hidden and waiting-to-ambush enemies.
Cast Vortex Shield to protect your Allies from a barrage of incoming Projectiles.
Reduce stamina of tough veteran opponents to stop their combat skills, and charge them in the rear.

There are several ways to defeat your opponents,
but choices you can made are available through Characters that you have recruited.

Character-based Squad





Each squad can include up to 5 individual Characters,
each with their own traits and skills that support each other.

The Squad Composition will decide the advantages that you have over your opponent.

Put a Priestess inside a Squad of Riflemen, and Projectiles will be partially convert to Magical Damage and pierce Enemies' Armor.
Put a Shielder alongside a RuneCaster, and he will protect her from Enemy's Sniping fire.

The possibilities for strategic decision is almost infinite.

But these amazing individuals will only join you if you fulfilled their requests during your journey.

Large Open Field with Objectives





The Battle will take place in a large open field where Player can explore to find hidden quests and lore within the world.

Destroying a Bandit hideout to recruit militia from a nearby village.
Finding a hidden temple to unlock special skills.
Choose a side between two feuding warriors.... or simply beat up both of them.

And many more.

-------------------------------------

Welcome to the World of Historica Fantasia.
